mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(start_time,1,10) as days, SUM(n.success_num) as successNum, SUM(n.success_num) / SUM(n.total_num) as successRate, SUM(n.total_num) - SUM(n.success_num) as falseNum FROM task_result m LEFT JOIN set_result n ON m.task_result_id = n.task_result_id WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= m.start_time GROUP BY days;
